Program_Title: President Obama on what extending unemployment insurance means for all of us

Headlines: Earlier this week, long-term unemployment benefits expired for an estimated 2.1-million Americans. When speaking yesterday to newly-elected governors http://www.whitehouse.gov/the-press-office/2010/12/02/remarks-president-and-v... , President Obama touched on several issues affecting our country -- in particular, he discussed the importance of extending these essential benefits for those still looking for work.
